prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Bach family papers, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Ellen Botsford Bach was a 1901 graduate of the University of Michigan. Her brother Waldo Botsford Bach attended the University of Michigan from 1897 to 1898. In 1898, during the Spanish American War, he served as a private with Co. A, 31st Michigan Infantry.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of letters of Ellen Botsford Bach written while touring Europe and while attending the University of Michigan. Her other papers include reminiscences of her early life in Ann Arbor before 1900 and a recipe book. The papers of Waldo Bach consist of letters he wrote while serving in the Spanish American War.
